Looking at the map:
- The avatar's current position (row 7, col 1) has a wall to the left (row 7, col 0), a free space to the right (row 7, col 2), and can potentially navigate downward or upward.

Since there's no immediate left action available, I will attempt to move right to explore that path.

``` Action: 2 ``` 

I expect this action to succeed in moving the avatar to an open area and possibly enabling the collection of nearby resources (like chips), aligning with the strategy of gathering items to progress through the maze effectively.

Thus, I will move the avatar up.

``` Action: 4 ``` 

This movement aligns with the strategy of exploring available spaces, and I expect to uncover advantageous areas or resources that will assist in furthering the objective of reaching the exit.
